content: **keep in mind** there are countless patterns for cat beanies everywhere that come down to crocheting a simple rectangle and sewing it shut leaving one wide opening at the bottom i freehanded this one but it s so simple that there is a chance someone came up with something similar before i did so as well this pattern uses the **american crochet terminology** **hook size** = 5mm **yarn recommendation** weight 2 double stranded e g yarnart baby petalouda standard etc about **220m or 240yds** total 110m or 120yds each strand or weight 4-5 single stranded e g kartopu melange wool kartopu alpaca polo etc about **100m or 110yds** **abbreviations** chain - chain st/sts - stitch/stitches double_crochet - double_crochet stsc - stacked single_crochet decrease - double_crochet 2 together decrease **size of the finished beanie laying flat ** 28cm wide x 18cm long 11 wide x 7 long any questions comments concerns feel free to contact me - kami crochet 1 1 https //linktr ee/kami_crochet
